    Biography

    I am a self taught full stack web developer from Providence, RI. Over the last few years I have been writing various CLIs, web apps, and other miscellaneous programs in an attempt to make software development my career.

    US Army Reserves

    68W - Combat Medic | Dec 2012 - Present
    • Adhered to the standards set forth by my superiors as well as performing all tasks and duties in a military manner.
    • In any given scenario, render appropriate care to the patient based on best practices as outlined by the supervising MD, PA, or NP.
